name: malonyl-CoA:4-hydroxybenzoyl-[4-hydroxyphenylalkanoate synthase] malonyltransferase (4-hydroxyphenylalkanoate-forming)
definition: 4-Hydroxybenzoyl-[acp] + 8 Malonyl-CoA + 16 NADPH + 16 H+ <=> 17-(4-Hydroxyphenyl)heptadecanoyl-[acp] + 8 CO2 + 8 CoA + 16 NADP+ + 8 H2O
